tasks.task: Planting peanuts in April and May
subtasks: Plant peanut seeds in rows or desired pattern
Check for flower blooms above the ground
Identify peanuts developing below the ground via pegs
Ensure proper soil moisture and nutrition
Wait until four months after planting, around August or September
Detect when peanuts are ready (pegs turn brown)
